short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides the correct translation of the words 'Loli' and 'Lolicon'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To clear up the controversy around the use of the words "loli" or "lolicon", this highly-technical extension provides a contextually-corrected translation of the words as it finds them on websites.
